gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hornets 115, Grizzlies 106
gameRecap.excerpt: The Hornets defeated the Grizzlies, 115-106. Miles Bridges recorded a team-high 25 points, along with six rebounds and five assists for the Hornets, while Brandon Miller added 18 points and six rebounds in the victory. Jaren Jackson Jr. notched 29 points (5-9 3PT FG), three rebounds and three assists for the Grizzlies in the losing effort. The Hornets improve to 11-41 on the season, while the Grizzlies fall to 18-35.
